UI: Content Card

Business Card

The Business Card displays local business listings with complete contact information. Features business name, full postal address, telephone, email, website, opening hours with day-by-day schedule, and price range indicator. Uses Schema.org/LocalBusiness markup for local search optimization and Google Maps integration.
